alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Forsyth (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 2:30PM EDT until August 15 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Forsyth County in central North Carolina... Northern Davidson County in central North Carolina... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mocksville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winston-Salem, Lexington, Thomasville, Kernersville, Clemmons, Bermuda Run, Lewisville, Walkertown, Rural Hall and Pfafftown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 85 between Mile Markers 98 and 104. Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 182 and 204. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
